description: This file is the main frontend HTML page for a web-based database visualization tool. It includes embedded CSS for styling and JavaScript for fetching and dynamically displaying database, table, and data information, allowing users to browse and view database contents interactively.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list and resets UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database entries in the sidebar and loads corresponding tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs HTML to display table data, including headers and rows.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual table cell based on value type.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long strings or objects.
